trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> event that occurs one or more times when a user drags a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control with the mouse.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs"></xref> class.
The horizontal change in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> position since the last <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> event.
The vertical change in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> position since the last <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> event.

Gets the horizontal distance that the mouse has moved since the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> event when the user drags the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control with the mouse.
A horizontal change in position of the mouse during a drag operation.

Converts a method that handles the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> event to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventHandler"></xref> type.
This implementation casts the `genericHandler` as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventHandler>.

Gets the vertical distance that the mouse has moved since the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> event when the user drags the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> with the mouse.
A vertical change in position of the mouse during a drag operation.
